TechVista Systems - Breaking New Frontiers - Now in Australia
TechVista Systems celebrates its recent success in Australia after signing a strategic deal with City Convenience Stores.
Sydney, Australia, August 29, 2015 --( PR.com )-- TechVista Systems, a subsidiary of TechVista LLC and now a leading technology provider in international markets, celebrates its recent success in Australia after signing a strategic deal with City Convenience Stores – a large retail chain that spans the commonwealth.
“TechVista Systems is determined to establish long-term and mutually beneficial relationships with prestigious and well-known brands in this new market, and we are thankful to our customers for placing their trust in us,” said Asif Peer, CEO, TechVista Systems and Managing Director, TechVista LLC.
He further added, “Based on our delivery, we will be able to win customer references leading to a growing business in this new market. In addition to feeding the established technical workforce of TechVista LLC for offshore services, TechVista has also expanded its talent footprint by employing highly skilled resources in the new markets we’ve entered to diversify its workforce as part of its global growth strategy.”
The software solution being provided to City Convenience Stores is implementation of Microsoft Dynamics AX to help them achieve their business goals.
Khurram Majeed, Senior Vice President, TechVista Systems said, “TechVista, with its enhanced and international workforce, is ideally placed to build solutions tailored to the local business needs in its markets. To deliver fast-track implementations of innovative software solutions with vertical integrations and other specialized services, we rely heavily on our research and development, innovation, domain knowledge, technical expertise, methodologies, products, frameworks, and accelerators established by TechVista Systems and its parent company, TechVista LLC.”
About TechVista Systems
TechVista Systems delivers innovative business solutions in Information Technology and technology-led Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) services. TechVista LLC as a leading technology provider with over 2,500 employees around the world, assists its local and international customers maximize their IT investments by creating specialized business solutions that drive business results. We leverage our deep technical skills, accelerators, frameworks, products, best practices, and domain expertise in provision of these solutions to help our customers achieve their business goals by gaining a competitive edge regardless of their local environment.
The winning combination at TechVista Systems composed of talented people, best-in-class technology, innovative business practices and value-added global alliances offers the best resources to corporate and public organizations. For more information, visit us online at http://www.techvistasystems.com.au.
